ygData.subject: Re: Very Nice EQ Movie
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve seen that movie.  It is moving.  There are a couple more that are hilarious!  I recommend CCH Agent Sinzan. ... and ... to ... can ... as ... the
ygData.messageBody:
I've seen that movie. It is moving. There are a couple more that
are hilarious! I recommend CCH Agent Sinzan.


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Ronnie (Conoley)" <prarloyd@h...>
wrote:
> Hi Everyone,
>
> I wanted to share with you a very nice EQ movie I found some
> time ago online. I warn you though I found it to be very touching
and
> filled with emotion. It is a big flash movie and took me about an
> hour to load on my 56k connection, but it is worth the wait, it is
> truly unforgettable. When you first visit the link it will ask you
to
> download a japanese language pack, just click cancel to that, you
can
> view the movie perfectly fine without it. I hope you all enjoy it
as
> much as I did, please reply with your thoughts and feelings about
the
> movie after you watch it.
>
> http://home.att.ne.jp/surf/mirage/memory_album.html
